page.title: 02Production at Huntley Quarry
page.content:
Production at Huntley Wood Sand and Gravel Quarry takes place as follows.
The Caterpillar D8L Dozer rips and dozes material into a Dowty Meco Loader Feeder. This discharges material onto a 33" field conveyor system which transfers it to a 7000 tonne surge pile.
The recovery tunnel is located under the surge pile. Material is drawn via the recovery tunnel and conveyed to twin Pegson 7'x 20' super scrubbers.
All fines washed from the scrubber barrels are taken to a Linatex sand plant which produces three grades of sand. After separation from the sand, the sorted gravel may be crushed and/or stock piled.
